stripped_text: When you rez this ice, take 1 bad publicity. You can advance this ice. It gains "Subroutine Trash 1 installed program unless the Runner pays 3 credits." for each hosted advancement counter.
text:
When you rez this ice, take 1 bad publicity.
You can advance this ice. It gains "[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program unless the Runner pays 3[credit]." for each hosted advancement counter.
title: Swarm
